title: Ep53: SPECIAL - Isandlwana
itunes:title: Ep53: SPECIAL - Isandlwana
itunes:subtitle: On the 142nd anniversary of the ill-fated Battle of Isandlwana, Peter and Gary tell the story of this dark chapter of the British Army. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history...
description:
On the 142nd anniversary of the ill-fated Battle of Isandlwana, Peter and Gary tell the story of this dark chapter of the British Army.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
